original_text: Abraham and Sarah were already very old, and Sarah was past the age of childbearing.
korean_text: 아브라함과 사라는 나이가 많아 늙었고 사라에게는 여성의 생리가 끊어졌는지라

sentences.original_text: Abraham and Sarah were already very old
and Sarah was past the age of childbearing
sentences.korean_translation: 사라는 자녀를 낳을 수 있는 나이를 이미 지났습니다
